Price: $79.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:36 UTC – Details)



The 13MP triple rear camera captures small details and artistic depth in HD. Explore modes like Super Macro, HDR, Portrait, and more. And thanks to AI Scene Detection, it can recognize and enhance different types of scenes like landscapes or architecture.
Enjoy smooth performance with the powerful Octa-core processor, long battery life with Smart Manager optimization with more than 17 hours of mixed usage in a single charge, and the convenience of Face Unlock for easy access to your phone.
3GB RAM / 32GB Internal Storage | MicroSD up to 512GB
Carrier: This phone is locked to Tracfone, which means this device can only be used on the Tracfone wireless network.
Unlimited Talk, Text and Data plans starting as low as dollars20/month

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $299.99 - $229.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:14:57 UTC – Details)

From the brand

TCL 30 SE

Revolutionary Viewing

TCL 30XL

Elevate Your Vision

TCL 30 5G

Maximize Your Entertainment

TCL enjoy more

6.53” FHD+ Dotch LCD display: Powered by NXTVISION, will upgrade your visual experience with the sharper details, vibrant images and allow you to enjoy true-to-life color accuracy in everything you present.TCL 10L Unlocked Android Smartphone is made for the US with a one-year US warranty.
Superior clarity day & night: Coming with a 48MP high-res AI camera(48MP+8MP+2MP+2MP) and 6MP front-facing selfie camera, TCL 10L android phone helps you capture crisp and vivid pictures. The AI-powered camera recognizes and enhances scenes & objects for your best creations.
Compatible with GSM carriers(AT&T and T-Mobile). TCL 10L mobile phone is also certified for use on Verizon’s LTE network. If your device is not receiving messages or experiences an error when making phone calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices, please contact Verizon’s technical support team or your account’s business representative for assistance. This phone is not compatible with CDMA networks. (such as Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)
Comfortable viewing all day: Auto-adjusting display provides the best viewing experience regardless of lighting conditions. A 4000mAh battery and Intelligent Battery Mode optimize power usage to keep you cord-free all day. Please know that on TCL 10L phone WIFI calling is only compatible with T-Mobile.

Superior Clarity

TCL 10L unlocked android smartphone capture the moment like never before with an AI quad camera system that integrates auto-brightness, super resolution, HDR & more. There are vibrant pixels in every shot, day or night. Experience 3 times more brightness and capture greater detail even in the darkest of settings.

Greater View

With the TCL 10L android phone you can find the beauty in little things with a Macro Camera that captures the rich textures, and tiny details of all your favorite things.

Full-Scene Photos

TCL 10L’s 118° wide-angle camera includes 3.3 times more of the world in a single shot. Gather your friends for a beautiful sunset and take an unforgettable photo or video – with everyone in it. Snap a breathtaking landscape and be able to capture the entirety of the beauty around you.

Imaginative Video

With the TCL 10L, you can set up shortcut keys in an instant. Get maximum control so you will know exactly what’s happening on your screen and what you’re touching, making life more convenient and effortless for you.

Read more

Smart Key for Fast Access

The Smart Key allows you to customize your TCL 10L mobile phone to access any dedicated app or feature with the press of a button. Make your phone as unique as you.

Effortless Unlocking

Never worry about your phone getting into the wrong hands again. With the convenience and security of two forms of authentication (Face Key and a fingerprint sensor), you get safe and fast access to your cell phone. One simple touch or glance will bring you straight to your favorite apps or important messages.

Powerful Audio

Enjoy a seamlessly connected lifestyle by connecting up to four speakers or headphones at once. Bring the party to life and share your favorite playlist on the go with a personalized listening experience.

Talkback Blind Mode

Optimized Power A 4000mAh battery and Intelligent Battery Mode optimize power usage to keep you cord-free all day.

Read more





30SE Smartphone
30XL Smartphone
A30 Smartphone
30 Z Smartphone
20S Smartphone
20 Pro 5G Smartphone
Network 4G 4G 4G 4G 4G 5G
Cost 149.99/169.99 179.99 99.99 129.99 249.99 499.99
Unlocked Unlocked for T-Mobile and AT&T Unlocked for Verizon、T-Mobile and AT&T Unlocked for Verizon、T-Mobile and AT&T Unlocked for Verizon、T-Mobile and AT&T Unlocked for Verizon、T-Mobile and AT&T Unlocked for T-Mobile 5G、Verizon 5G and AT&T LTE
Rear Camera 50MP + 2MP + 2MP 50MP + 5MP + 2MP + 2MP 8MP 8MP 64MP + 8MP + 2MP + 2MP 48MP+ 16MP + 5MP+ 2MP
Front Camera 8MP 13MP 5MP 5MP 16MP 32MP
Display 6.52″ HD+ display 6.82″ V-notch display 5.5″ HD+ Vivid display 6.1″ HD+ Vivid display 6.67″ FHD+ Dotch display 6.67″ FHD+ Dotch display
Chipset Helio G25 MT6762V Octa-core processor MTK 6761V_CA Qualcomm Snapdragon 665 Qualcomm Snapdragon 750
Memory 4GB+64GB / 4GB + 128GB 6GB+64GB 3GB+32GB 3GB+32GB 4GB+128GB 6GB+256GB
Battery 5000mAh 5000mAh 3000mAh 3000mAh 5000 mAh 4500 mAh
Face Unlock
✓
✓
✓
✓
✓
✓

Network

Compatible with GSM carriers, including AT&T and T-Mobile. TCL 10L unlocked smartphone is also certified for use on Verizon’s LTE network. If your device is not receiving messages or experiences an error when making phone calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices, please contact Verizon’s team or your account’s business representative for assistance. This phone is not compatible with CDMA networks. (such as Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)

TCL 10L – NXTVISION Display

Optimize your media playback and creative expression with TCL 10L’s NXTVISION visual technology. Experience streaming in a whole new way thanks to an expansive 6.53” FHD+ NXTVISION display with a dedicated display engine that enhances color, clarity and contrast in real time. HDR feature improves ordinary videos so you can enjoy sharp, remastered HDR content no matter the source. Plus, browse and read comfortably with an array of eye protection modes.

Capture greatness with the NXTVISION 48MP AI-powered quad rear camera and 16MP front camera. The quad camera consists of a 48MP high resolution camera, a super wide-angle camera, a macro camera and a depth camera for amazing portraits. Create fun and artistic clips with wide angle and stop motion video modes.

Make life on the go a little easier with a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 665 octa-core processor, and a reliable 4000mAh battery with smart power optimization. Tap-and-go with a customizable interface, Smart Key, Face Key and fingerprint sensor that provide access effortlessly.

Technical Parameters:

HD Voice

Lens: 6P + 5P + 3P + 3P

Aperture: F1.8 + F2.2 + F2.4 + F2.4

Processor: Qualcomm Snapdragon 665

Speed & Type: Qualcomm Kyro 260 octa-core processor

RAM+ROM: 6GB+256GB

Weight: 6.35oz/ 180g

GPU: Adreno 610

Dimensions: 6.38” x 2.98” x 0.33” / 162.2 x 75.6 x 8.4 mm

What’s Included

1 x TCL 10 L Mobile Phone(with Screen Protector)

1 x TCL 10 L Mobile Phone Case

1 x Sim Card Tray Pin

1 x Type-C Cable

1 x Charger

1 x User Manual

Notes: Headphones, Sim Card and SD Card not included

4
Price: $299.99 - $229.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:14:57 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:42:36 UTC – Details)


Network
NO 5G AND NFC
Compatible with the T-Mobile and AT&T LTE networks. networks. TCL 30 SE android phone is currently not certified for use on Verizon. Not compatible with any CDMA networks. (such as Verizon, Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)

Note
* TCL 30 SE is single SIM mobile phone, does not support 5G, NFC, and 5Ghz Wi-Fi.
* Wifi calling supported on these carriers: T-mobile, Metro, Straight talk/tracfone t-mobile sim card, simple, walmart family mobile, ultra mobile, mint mobile.

Information
Turn your great times into magical memories with a 50MP AI triple camera. Enjoy collecting memories with large storage of up to 64GB. Two-day battery life keeps you doing what you love, while a minimalistic design makes you live in style. The face key & fingerprint sensor provide access effortlessly.

Technical Parameters:
2G Quadbands : GSM 850/900/1800/1900
3G Bands : B1/2/4/5/8
4G LTE bands: B2/3/4/5/7/8/12/13/17/26/28/66
Display: 6.52-inch Mini-notch HD+ 20:9 display (720 x 1600 pixels)
Screen-to-body ratio: 90%
AI Quad Camera: 50MP Main Camera+2MP Macro Camera+2MP Depth Camera
Front camera resolution: 8MP
Chipset: Helio G25
CPU: 4 x Cortex-A53 @ 2.0GHz+4 x Cortex-A53 @ 1.5GHz
GPU: IMG GE8320 650MHz
Memory: 4GB RAM + 64GB ROM (Supports micro SD card up to 512GB, SD card not included)
Dimensions:.6.50 x 2.97 x 0.35 inch
Battery: 5000mAh
Audio：One speaker + dual-mic noise cancellation

What’s in the box
1 x TCL 30 SE Mobile phone
1 x TCL 30 SE Mobile Phone Case
1 x Screen Protector
1 x Type-C Cable
1 x Charger (5V 2A)
1 x Sim Card Pin 
1 x Quick Guide
Notes: Headphones, SIM Card and SD Card are not included.
6.52″ HD+ display: Powered by NXTVISION, AI optimization allows the screen to deliver more colorfulness and crisp clarity to immerse you in subtle details. Eye-comfort modes have better protection against blue light. You will feel less eye strain while using TCL mobile phone 30 SE in dimly lit places and enjoy reading time comfortably under sunlight. 
Wireless carrier: Compatible with the T-Mobile and AT&T LTE networks. This device is currently not certified for use on Verizon. Not compatible with any CDMA networks. (such as Verizon, Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)
50MP AI triple camera & Gesture shooting: With TCL 30 SE android phone, you can capture fast-moving subjects or take clear photos in dimly lit environments. Gesture shooting entirely frees your hands and makes taking easier.
Two-day battery life: 5000 mAh massive battery lets you worry less about battery levels during weekends. Two-day battery life keeps you doing what you love, and intelligent charging mode prolongs the battery’s lifespan.
TCL 30 SE mobile phone does not support 5G, NFC, and 5Ghz Wi-Fi.This Model is the US version with a one-year US warranty, single SIM.
About screen sensitivity: Our phones are set to a neutral screen sensitivity defaultly. If you find the screen unsensitive, please adjust the sensitivity level through settings ( Settings -> System – > Languages & input ->Advanced ->Pointer speed).Drag the slider right to increase sensitivity. Drag the slider left to decrease sensitivity.


Previous page

  1. PREMIUM DISPLAY, INTUITIVE FEATURES

    Enjoy the expansive 6.52” display, powered by NXTVISION. Watch as your videos and photos come to life with vibrant true-to-life color enhancements and real-time HDR upscaling.

  2. BINGE WITHOUT WORRY

    Adaptive Eye care modes reduce harmful blue lights, turn monochromatic for a booklike feel, and promotes readability in direct sunlight.

Next page

Previous page

  1. INTELLIGENTLY BEAUTIFUL

    Capturing stunning photos and HD video has never been so easy with AI-powered 50MP triple rear camera system with 2MP Depth and Macro lens.

  2. COMPLETE ANY CHALLENGE

    Use the built-in features to make taking the perfect photo even easier, with Gesture Shot a simple movement can activate the countdown timer and Steady Snap to capture motion with less blur.

  3. BEAUTIFULLY YOU

    Show your best side in video chats using the 8MP front-facing camera, while HDR elevates all your stunning selfies.

Next page

Previous page

  1. MAXIMUM RELIABILITY

    Take on your day or new adventures with a powerful 5000mAh battery delivers a days worth of mixed-use on a single charge letting you focus on the task at hand and not searching for the next outlet.

  2. MORE FOR YOU TO ENJOY

    Feel the sublime user experience powered by a 2.0GHz octa-core processor and multitask to your hearts delight with 4GB of RAM for always smooth performance.

  3. ENOUGH SPACE FOR IT ALL

    Store all of your favorite content with 64GB of internal storage, expandable to 512GB via microSD card (sold separately).

Next page

ARTFULLY CRAFTED, DIGITALLY SECURE

Simple and sleek with a finish that glistens in the light. Biometric security safely stores your data and content so only you can access it.

4
Price: $159.99 - $139.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:42:36 UTC – Details)

Manufacturer TCL
Country of Origin China
Date First Available May 11, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $199.99 - $179.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:40 UTC – Details)



Unlocked Smartphone

The TCL 30XL works with most major U.S. carriers, including Verizon, AT&T and T-Mobile (Sprint not included). This android phone is also compatible with Metro PCS, Simple Mobile, Cricket, Ultra Mobile, H2O, Tello, Consumer Cellular, RedPocket (Only GSMA network), Pure talk, Viya, etc. If your phone doesn’t work with Verizon, please restart the phone. If your cell phone experiences an error when making calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices with the assistance of Verizon’s technical support team or your account’s business representative. For Straight Talk and TracFone, this model only supports T-Mobile and AT&T compatible Sim cards but does not support Verizon compatible sim card. This mobile phone isn’t compatible with other CDMA networks, such as Sprint, Assurance wireless, Spectrum, Xfinity, Boost Mobile, etc.

WIFI Calling:

This phone supports WIFI Calling on the following Carriers: T-Mobile, Metro, Straight talk(AT&T and T-Mobile), Simple, Cricket, Ultra.

Technical Parameters：

Display: 6.82 inch V-notch HD+ 20.5:9 display (720 x 1640 pixels)
Screen: LCD
Screen-to-body ratio: 90%
AI Quad Camera: 50MP Main Camera+5MP Ultra-Wide Angle Camera+2MP Macro Camera+2MP Depth Camera
Front camera resolution: 13MP
Chipset: MT6762V
CPU: 4*A53 2.0Ghz + 4*A53 1.5Ghz Octa-Core
GPU: IMG GE8320
Memory: 6GB RAM + 64GB ROM (Expandable up to 512GB with Micro SD card, SD card not included)
Dimensions: 6.78 x 3.03 x 0.36 inch
Weight (g): 204.4g
Battery: 5000mAh 9V2A
2G Bands: GSM 850/900/1800/1900
3G Bands: B2/4/5
4G LTE Bands: B2/4/5/12 (MFBI)/13/66/71/25/26/41HPUE
Sim Card: Single Sim, Nano-sized
Audio: Dual Speaker
Audio Jack: 3.5mm audio jack
System Language: English, Spanish and French

What’s Included

1 x TCL 30 XL Mobile phone
1 x 18W Charger (9V 2A)
1 x Type-C Cable
1 x Sim Card Tray Pin
1 x Quick Guide
1 x LCD sticker
1 x Product Safety Information

Cinematic Viewing Experience – Featuring a 6.82 inch expansive screen with 20.5:9 aspect ratio and dual speakers design, the TCL 30XL android phone allows you to enjoy the thrill of cinematic viewing. The unique TCL NXTVISION Technology is able to boost color, clarity and contrast of visuals while protecting your eyes from harmful blue light. This TCL phone can work as a decent gaming phone, and is also perfect for streaming video and making video calls.
Large Battery, Fun for All Day – The 5000mAh mighty battery of this unlocked android smartphone can power up your entertainment for up to 3 days on one charge (estimated data based on internal lab test). With 18W fast-charging and an on-the-go reverse charging (OTG cable not included) option you can fuel and refuel your mobile phone in an instant.
Powerful, Smooth and Safe – With the 6GB Ram storage and Octa-Core processor, this unlocked cell phone provides you with an instant response time. Keep all of your precious memories with the 64GB built-in storage, and even more with a Micro SD card (sold separately) that lets you add up to 512GB memory. You can also multitask smoothly thanks to the Android 12 operating system and the floating window mode. The phone’s face unlock technology brings a carefree experience with abundant joy.
Seize the Beauty of Life – Explore the allure of highly detailed shots and broad landscape with the 50MP AI quad camera of this android phone. The AI camera system can optimize your picture according to different lighting conditions, and clear any unnecessary object that you select in the background, allowing you to be the protagonist all the time. The 13MP front-facing selfie camera of this stylish smartphone can capture you in a unique way.


Previous page
Next page

Previous page
Next page

Previous page
Next page

4
Price: $199.99 - $179.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:40 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $39.88
(as of Nov 29,2022 23:48:30 UTC – Details)


The TCL A3 in Prime Black from Tracfone features a spacious 5.5” 18:9 HD+ display in a compact body, packing a lot of punch in a small frame. Take stunning photos with the 8MP rear camera with Pro mode or start a video chat with the 5MP selfie camera. Facial recognition conveniently unlocks your phone so you can stay on top of social media updates, calls, and emails. The large battery, fast processor, and ample expandable memory help you keep up with your daily multi-tasking needs. Choose a Tracfone plan with Unlimited Talk & Text with Unlimited Carryover Data and enjoy Unbeatable nationwide 5G coverage on America’s largest and most dependable networks.
The large 3000 mAh battery with Smart Manager optimization can easily handle your daily demands with more than 14 hours of mixed usage in a single charge. A powerful Octa-core processor provides a smooth multitasking experience.Optical sensor resolution:5 megapixels.Display Type:LCD.Form_factor : Bar
Take sharp pictures with the 8MP rear camera and record steady videos in high definition. The 5MP selfie camera with Portrait mode allows you to share stylish portraits with a blurred background effect.
3GB RAM / 32GB Internal Storage | MicroSD up to 512GB
Carrier: This phone is locked to Tracfone, which means this device can only be used on the Tracfone wireless network.
Unlimited Talk, Text and Data plans starting as low as dollar 20/month

  1. Take control of your wireless life

    Tracfone offers Unlimited Talk and Text plans with Unlimited Carryover Data*

  2. Now you’re in control

    Experience wireless freedom. You don’t want to be locked into a contract, that’s why Tracfone doesn’t have them. Plus, there are no activation or cancellation fees, ever.

How will my plan card be delivered?

A physical Tracfone plan card will be shipped directly to you.

Do I need a PIN to go with this plan?

The PIN to activate your new plan is on the back of the plan card. You do not need a separate PIN.

Do I need a SIM card with this plan?

You’ll need a Tracfone compatible phone (which comes with a built-in SIM card) or Keep Your Own Phone SIM Kit to activate service. If you already have an active Tracfone phone, add your plan to your account by following the instructions on the card.

How do I activate service with Tracfone?

You can activate service on the Tracfone website. You’ll need the IMEI/MEID/Serial # from a Tracfone phone or Tracfone SIM Card and a service plan PIN ready. Follow the step-by-step instructions provided in your package.

Where can I buy a phone that is compatible with this wireless service plan?

All Tracfone phones available on Amazon are compatible with this plan or you can activate service on a phone you already have with a Tracfone Keep Your Own Phone SIM Kit.

Disclaimers

*Unlimited Carryover: For Unlimited Talk & Text Smartphone plans, any unused data after your service end date will carryover to the next cycle if active service is maintained and in use with any Unlimited Talk & Text Smartphone plan. For other service plans, any unused minutes, texts and data will not expire as long as any Tracfone service plan is active and in use within any six-month period.
